item.title: [Python] Text expansion using Mac service
item.description: # Service that evaluates and rewrites text selection range in Python After reading the blog below, I was impressed and created the Python version. (The following article is a Ruby version) I’ll write it down in the hope that it will be noticeable to everyone in Pythonista. Reference site [Two functions “Automator” and “Service” that must be used if you are using Mac]](http://r-kurain.hatenablog.com/entry/20130219/1361270262) Debugging Automator
